settings.content:
Dr. Shirono’s dream is for people to be happy with their skin, not just for now, but to be able to stay youthful
and beautiful for as long as they want.

settings.title: Japan’s Medical Skin Care Brand for Everyday Use
“Beauty, Hidden Deep Within the Skin, Waiting to be Awakened”
settings.description: - Dr. Shirono

settings.title: Hydration Driving Beauty
settings.description: Moisture is the key to an excellent skin care regimen, and Dr. Shirono has made hydration and moisture his legacy by constantly innovating and improving formulas for the skin to obtain and retain moisture.

settings.title: No Unnecessities
settings.description: Unique formulas that does not contain any unnecessary components, Dr.Ci:Labo’s products contain only carefully selected ingredients that will enhance the beauty of any skin.

settings.title: Striving For Perfection
settings.description:
Today, Dr.Ci:Labo is the No.1 medical cosmetic brand in Japan. We continue to strive, surpassing conventions with cutting-edge science, improving the skin care industry with medical expertise, commitment to R&D, and quality.
Realising the dream of helping women achieve eternally beautiful skin.


*Based on Dr.Ci:Labo share of 40% of Japan’s Medical cosmetics market. Source: Yano Research Institute Ltd. Cosmetic Industry 2015

settings.title: To Japan
settings.sub_title: The Dream of Eternally Beautiful Skin is Born
settings.description: Dr. Yoshinori Shirono was running a dermatology clinic in Tokyo, when he learned from his patients that there were no products in the market that could resolve their skin problems.

settings.title: A Dream
settings.description: He set out to create a skincare solution. Not a treatment after problems occur, but an everyday skincare regimen that refines the skin through products that deliver full nourishment without stressful components. And the dream of achieving eternally beautiful skin began.

settings.title: Achieve Eternally Beautiful Skin
settings.description: He discovered that if he could, at the same time, aid the skin’s inherent ability for moisture retention, and its ability to deliver ample amounts of stress-free nutrients to the depths of the skin, he would be able to give his clients what they were asking for – eternally beautiful skin.

settings.title: Unique Products
settings.description: His quest for beautiful skin gave birth to Aqua Collagen Gel in 1998 – A product that revolutionised the skincare industry, sending the world of beauty into a new era where achieving good skin never needs to be a complicated affair again.

settings.title: Good Pore Care = Good Skin Care
settings.description:
Good Skin Care starts with caring for your Pores! Labo Labo by Dr.Ci:Labo is a full skin care regimen designed to tackle those pores once and for all.*

*Individual results vary.

settings.title:
They Are Not Invited To The Party!
But The Pores Still Show Up! Arrrgh!
settings.description: There are 2 ways they reveal themselves: As Round Pores when excess sebum stays in the pore, forcing it to open. As Diagonal Pores when skin is losing firmness and elasticity, pulling pores aside and enlarging them.
Blackheads are formed when the pore is clogged.
The lotion helps clean the pores.
Pores become smaller as the skin re-establishes its elasticity. Appearance of pores is diminished.

settings.title: “Invisible” Should be Your Pores’ Middle Name
settings.subtitle: THE SECRET REVEALED
settings.description:
LaboLabo by Dr.Ci:Labo tackles the pores from all fronts, to make them tight, upright and invisible to the eye.
UNCLOG – with AHA and Lactic Acid
TIGHTEN – with Collagen and Hyaluronic Acid
SHIELD – with Pore Care Complex

settings.title: Step 1 Cleanse – Wipe your pore problems away
settings.description: Super-Keana Oil Cleansing provides effective make-up removal with pore- refining, hydrating and skin softening benefits.

settings.title: Step 2 Wash
settings.description: Super-Keana Washing, a soft and creamy cleanser with a unique formulation that provides rich foam for effective cleansing while being gentle on the skin.

settings.title: Step 3 Tone
settings.description: Super-Keana Lotion, a refreshing toner that clears pore congestion, refine pores and hydrates the skin.

settings.title: Step 4 Moisturise
settings.description: Super-Keana Gel, a multi- functional gel filled with moisture that gives you a long-lasting hydration and pore refining benefits.
No Perfume
No Colouring
No Mineral Oils
Paraben Free
Alcohol Free
No Petroleum Surfactant Agents

settings.title: Best Toner for Oily Skin
settings.description:
Labo Labo Super-Keana Lotion
Style, Beauty Best Buy 2016

settings.title: Best No More Pores Refining Cleanser -Normal Skin
settings.description:

Cleo, Clear Skin Awards 2016

settings.title: AWARDS
settings.description: Our Labo Labo pore-care range has won a number of prestigious awards.

settings.title: Dehydration
settings.description: Dr. Shirono has created a complete moisture system capable of hydrating your skin from within for a softer, more refined and plump skin.

settings.benefit__value: Increasing Moisture Level in the Skin

settings.title: Help Your Skin Retain its Moisture Level
settings.description: Dr. Shirono has carefully selected ingredients and crafted formulas to suit any skin’s need for moisture.

settings.title: Dr.Ci:Labo Prescribes A Moisture-Retaining Skin Care Routine

settings.title: Anti-Ageing
settings.description: Dr. Shirono has developed an anti-ageing skin care system that rebuilds elasticity and definition, strengthening the core of the skin from within.

settings.title: An Omni-directional Approach to Anti-Ageing Skin Care
settings.description: Leveraging on the latest advancements in nano-technology, Anti-Ageing Skin Care from Dr.Ci:Labo holds gold collagen EX, a patented formula that balances the positive and negative ion charges.

settings.title: Dr.Ci:Labo Prescribes An Age-Defying Skin Care Routine

(*In Dr.Ci:Labo’s range of products).

settings.products_details__description:
The skin’s ability to produce collagen is a key determining factor in maintaining natural elasticity and definition. Dr.Ci:Labo’s solution to support intense rejuvenation is an omni-directional approach inspired by the clinical skin-tightening therapy - Ulthera.

The ultimate anti-ageing moisturiser*, this gel works at the foundational level of skin** to not only lock in moisture, but also help to firm, lift and tighten.
(* In Dr.Ci:Labo’s range of products; **epidermal layers only)

settings.prescribe__description: Apply “pearl-size” amount in the morning and evening, spread the moisturiser lightly all over the face.
Spread the moisturiser thoroughly throughout the face ensuring all corners of the face is covered.
Apply gentle palm pressure on the entire face.

settings.explenation__description: The nanocapsule bursts on the surface of the skin.

The multi-layers of water-soluble and oil-soluble layers peel off one by one, releasing over 120 effective ingredients.
The mini-capsules are then released to go even deeper into the skin’s stratum corneum layer, providing moisture skin deep.

2 Types of Ceramides: To enhance and help restore the skin’s protective function while retaining moisture
3 Types of Hyaluronic Acids: To deliver long lasting hydration
5 Types of Collagen: To retain moisture
22 Types of Amino Acids: To help stimulate collagen and elastin production in the skin

Apply gentle palm pressure on the entire face.

Pamper your skin with the light gel texture of Aqua Collagen Gel Super Moisture EX that locks moisture at the surface whilst over 120 beautifying ingredients penetrate deep into the skin*, intelligently releasing moisture throughout the day.
For an ultimate moisture retention for the skin, complement your daily skincare routine with the Super100 Series Hyaluronic Acid. Free of artificial fragrance, coloring and mineral oil, this high quality serum contains enriched hyaluronic acid for intense skin hydration.
* Ingredients penetrate into stratum corneum layer of skin.
